source_text: Honest history. Secular historians seem quick to cover over the defeats of their people. In contrast Bible writers candidly recorded both their personal failings and those of their nation.
target_text: Ne tshob nenùne. Ghasoñ tshô njù num lem nukebwô tshobe. Ndaʼndù ghakide Ñwaʼni Nsi ke ntshob mub fan nu mba tse ben tshobe.

source_text: Can we really believe what the Bible says?
target_text: Mbe be bam kwaʼ ju Ñwaʼni nsi tshob ké?

source_text: Yes, for at least three reasons:
Numerous other Bible prophecies were also fulfilled down to the smallest detail. But is that not what we would expect of the Word of God?
target_text: Ñwaʼni Nsi ya tshob ntshob ndamnjù yame a bumde. A ke ju ze be tshwèt bib Ñwaʼni ze a fe Nsi ké?
